mapper.insert: insert into od (START_ID, END_ID, TICKET_ID, TXN_DATE, START_TIME, END_TIME, START_STATION, END_STATION) values (#{startId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{endId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ticketId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txnDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endStation,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select START_ID, END_ID, TICKET_ID, TXN_DATE, START_TIME, END_TIME, START_STATION, END_STATION from od
